metadata.title: CVE-2019-5057 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the PCX image-rendering functionality of SDL2_image 2.0.4. A specially crafted PCX image can cause a heap overflow, resulting in code execution. An attacker can display a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.5+dfsg1-1').
